plot: Harrie the cleaner receives an assignment from a cinema screen. He has to deliver a bomb to the only person capable of dismantling it. Preferably without it blowing up.
title: Bom
plot_es: Harrie the cleaner receives an assignment from a cinema screen. He has to deliver a bomb to the only person capable of dismantling it. Preferably without it blowing up.
plot_en: Harrie the cleaner receives an assignment from a cinema screen. He has to deliver a bomb to the only person capable of dismantling it. Preferably without it blowing up.
